text: Era'i tamra yamdera upare allah anugraha karechilena, -- adamasantanadera theke nabidera madhyekara, ara yadera amara nuhera sathe bahana karechilama tadera madhyekara, ara ibrahima o isama'ilera bansadharadera madhyera ebam yadera amara satpathe caliyechilama o manonita karechilama tadera madhyekara. Yakhani parama karunamayera bani tadera kache patha kara hato tara lutiye parata sijadarata haye o aâ€Œsrumocana karate karate.
